greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Irregular triangle read by rows in which row n lists the ranks of the partitions of n in nonincreasing order.
comment: The rank of a partition is the largest part minus the number of parts.
For more about this ordering, see A330370.
First differs from A105805 at a(49) = T(7,5).
results.author: _Omar E. Pol_, Dec 12 2019
ext: Edited by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 15 2020
